attributes.action: Give people on Income Support the additional £20 a week
attributes.additional_details: We should all be treated equally
attributes.background: Give people on Income Support the additional £20 a week that people on universal credit are entitled to help support this on income support through financial hardship during the pandemic.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566509
